<style>
  /* Center the viz and cap it so it doesn't get too wide on big screens */
  .tableau-wrap { max-width: 1100px; margin: 0 auto; }

  /* Make the Tableau placeholder responsive with a fixed aspect ratio.
     Your tablet layout is ~1024x680 → 680/1024 ≈ 66.5% */
  .tableauPlaceholder { position: relative; width: 100%; }
  .tableauPlaceholder::before { content: ""; display: block; padding-top: 66.5%; }

  /* Position the <object> to fill the responsive box */
  .tableauPlaceholder > object {
    position: absolute; inset: 0;
    width: 100%; height: 100%;
    display: block;
  }
</style>

<div class="tableau-wrap">
  <div class='tableauPlaceholder' id='viz1754621260676'>
    <noscript>
      <a href='#'>
        <img alt='Dashboard 1'
             src='https://public.tableau.com/static/images/Ho/HomeCreditQuickDemo/Dashboard1/1.png'
             style='border:none'/>
      </a>
    </noscript>
    <object class='tableauViz' style='display:none;'>
      <param name='host_url' value='https%3A%2F%2Fpublic.tableau.com%2F' />
      <param name='embed_code_version' value='3' />
      <param name='site_root' value='' />
      <param name='name' value='HomeCreditQuickDemo/Dashboard1' />
      <param name='tabs' value='no' />
      <param name='toolbar' value='yes' />
      <param name='static_image' value='https://public.tableau.com/static/images/Ho/HomeCreditQuickDemo/Dashboard1/1.png' />
      <param name='animate_transition' value='yes' />
      <param name='display_static_image' value='yes' />
      <param name='display_spinner' value='yes' />
      <param name='display_overlay' value='yes' />
      <param name='display_count' value='yes' />
      <param name='language' value='en-US' />
      <param name='filter' value='publish=yes' />
    </object>
  </div>
</div>

<script type='text/javascript'>
  // Get placeholder + object
  var divElement = document.getElementById('viz1754621260676');
  var vizElement = divElement.getElementsByTagName('object')[0];

  // Make it responsive: width 100%, height from aspect ratio
  function sizeViz() {
    var w = divElement.clientWidth;
    vizElement.style.width  = '100%';
    vizElement.style.height = Math.round(w * 0.665) + 'px'; // 66.5% of width
  }
  sizeViz();
  window.addEventListener('resize', sizeViz);

  // Load Tableau JS API
  var scriptElement = document.createElement('script');
  scriptElement.src = 'https://public.tableau.com/javascripts/api/viz_v1.js';
  vizElement.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptElement, vizElement);
</script>
